Hydras:

Hydras roared with fury and tookf off and faced Azure said "New 
Warrior, Blade???? If I didn't miss understand you once yelled that 
you would put my head a price... and are you sure that I'll said 
welcome after that????? what I'm sure that it isn't a Prime's trap?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> He stopped in mid air and transformed to Dragon mode. He wasn't 
very 
> nervous, just enthusiastic, and a bit eager to see Hydras' angered 
> face when he'd tell him.
> 
> He floated above Pred base like a King looking at his fiefdom. He 
> was going to have one hell of a good time.
> 
> AzureBlade: Hydras! Let your new warrior inside his home!
